website_summaries.verdict: These sheets deliver on their promise to give a soft cozy feel and hold their shape.
pros: Soft sheets give a comfortable feel
Set includes one flat sheet, one fitted sheet, and one pillow case
Lighter and softer than a jersey sheet set
Mattress grips help the sheets stay in place
cons: These are deep pocket sheets, which means they can have too much fabric if you have a thinner mattress

customer_reviews.title: Discription doesn't match product
customer_reviews.text: The info when I perchased them said they had 16" for the fitted sheet I could barely get them on the bed they are too tight so I look at the package it says for 14". The add was not correct and I already put them on the bed. I am not satisfied with these sheets!
customer_reviews.author: Powder

customer_reviews.title: FAKE REVIEWS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, ask yourself, does 36,000 reviews sound like a legit product? NO THESE ARE FAKE REVIEWS! These sheets are thinner than cheap 1ply toilet paper. They’re soft yes but rip and tear so easily. I’m a petite women, 5’4” and 130lbs. Washed them when they arrived, slept on them 3 nights and they’ve already ripped. No I don’t toss or turn more than any average sleeper. No I don’t have 16inch long nails on my hands or feet. No I don’t sleep with razor blades in my pockets. No I’m not Edward scissor hands. These sheets are garbage and a waste of money. All the reviews are fake!
customer_reviews.author: Shame on paid reviews

customer_reviews.title: Ehh...
customer_reviews.text: These sheets feel great and have held up very well. But I’m sad to say that they do not wash well. When they arrived they had a weird smell that I assumed must’ve been the packaging, etc... but after several washes the smell just seems to be getting worse and there’s no way I could ever put them on my bed and be able to lay my head on them with the smell. So dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Merrill

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth Your Money
customer_reviews.text: I am very dissatisfied with the bed sheets. When it arrived the sheet set looked really good and was looking forward to it. But once I got it set out on the mattress I realized the sheets were much thinner than I thought. Flimsy and see through. Due to the lac of its thickness it does not hold its shape well. In other words it is very flimsy. I regret I spent money on these sheet set. I don't think I will ever buy beddings/sheets online ever again. Sheets are best shopped around buying at stores. So disappointed. And not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Oasis in the desert

customer_reviews.title: Second set, lower quality
customer_reviews.text: I love these sheets for the price and comfort. I decided to get in another color, Major Bummedville. I ordered what I thought was a sea green (misty blue color description) but it is more like denim. The sheets (Q) were HUGE. The flat sheet hung over more like a Cal King. The fabric doesn’t seem the same. Oh, there are legit straps (like suspenders) on each corner of the fitted sheet. Threads stuck out, I dunno. I absolutely loved my first set-maybe stick to the basic colors for original design.
customer_reviews.author: Lin-z Kobylanski

customer_reviews.title: Good but...
customer_reviews.text: The sheets are VERY soft to be sure. Unfortunately, when they arrived I noticed some black lint all over the white sheets (inside the unopened package). Washed and put on my new bed and while they are super soft and cozy they are also VERY thin You can see the pattern of the mattress easily through them as well as any design on pillows. They also seem to attract and grab onto any schmutz or animal hair floating around. Good for the price to have an extra set of sheets on hand but won't be my go to sheets from now on. Glad I tested ordering them for my guest room before my master.
customer_reviews.author: I & S. Stark

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it’s just me when I purchased these sheets I Purchased them for really high-quality 1500 Count supreme collection bed sheets ???? I guess I need to do my research on sheets and the sheets are polyester they have a nice sheen on them but that is about it I’m really not satisfied with them I’m going to wash them I did sleep on them I’m going to wash them and see what happens next but at this time I would say no I would never buy this again I’m going to do my research for sure ..The color of the sheets are exactly what I was looking for though thanks
customer_reviews.author: DM.Tate

customer_reviews.title: Lots of pilling - Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan! We've washed these four or five times now and the pilling continues. They feel fine, although I prefer the feel of flannel. If they didn't pill, I would be happy with them. 1/7/19 Update: These are horrible!!! The pilling has become worse over time and the fibers spread all over the bedroom. Also, pillowcase thread is now unraveling. Pay a little more and get something better.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Surfer

customer_reviews.title: They're just okay
customer_reviews.text: The sheets are a nice color and exactly as pictured. They are slippery, but not in a good way, and aren't altogether comfortable. I can already see they won't hold up over time because the pillowcase which has now been washed just twice already has threads pulling out. I wouldn't purchase these again and would return them but they have been already washed.
customer_reviews.author: Loves Music

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after three washes!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these three weeks. While they are incredibly soft and comfortable, my pillowcase already has a hole the size of my fist in the seam. I received them on August 1st, washed once before putting on the bed and have washed twice since then. When I was replacing on the bed this time, I noticed a very large hole in the seam of one of the pillowcases. We have a new, no-agitator washer so I know it didn’t occur as a result of that. Very disappointed as these sheets came highly recommended for the value received for price paid. Unfortunately a decent purchase requires more than three weeks of use before falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hawes

customer_reviews.title: Extremely soft and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a king-sized 12" memory foam mattress and needed all new sheets. I'm a bachelor and straight, so had no appreciation for sheets. I bought a cheap set of microfiber from Walmart, a set of more expensive clearance 1000 thread count "luxury" sheets from Ross, and these. The microfiber are OK and feel nice, but are slick and bunch up easy. The 1000 thread count sheets are anything but luxurious, and while they look nice, aren't all that comfortable and I developed hot spots while sleeping. These sheets, however, are softer than all of them, feel great, seem of good quality, and are the favorite set for me and my current girlfriend. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Travis T.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value, very soft and warm.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 sets of these sheets, queen sized, in blue and taupe. I find them to be quite nice, especially at the price point. Pros: Very soft and comfortable. To me, they are warmer than I expected because of the microfiber weave as opposed to a standard cotton sheet set. These sheets are very soft and fit the queen bed very well. These sheets, for me, stay put and don't slip when I toss or turn. Color fast. Cons: Expect a lot of dryer lint until they have been laundered several times. If possible, check the water filter on the washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: K Moore

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Like Anything About Them
customer_reviews.text: These sheets arrived dirty on the outside of the packaging. Some places were dirty on the inside too, not terribly, but something new should arrive spotless. They also weren't ironed completely flat, they had almost "pleat" looking lines/wrinkles around the top underneath the seamed portion. Finally, they didn't feel very soft, and the ivory color was too yellow-toned. I ordered another set of sheets for my son's bed at the same time as these, by "Bare Home," and comparatively, those were much better quality and only cost about $5 more. I'm returning these. I wouldn't buy again, nor recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Great sheets for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 sets of these sheets now. They are really nice and a great value. Pros - extremely soft, lightweight, low price, color selection Cons - attracts dog hair like crazy, due to the lightweight nature the sheets are not extremely durable (I ripped a sheet quite easily on accident), they seem to get/look/feel dirty quickly (I wash once a week to keep them feeling clean) These sheets might not last as long as a more expensive option. But knowing that, they are a great option for a low price point.
customer_reviews.author: Vada

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT a high quality sheet set, it's a $25 sheet set.
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are 100% Polyester. These sheets are NOT 1500 thread count. They are probably like 250 thread count. The company called itself 1500 Supreme to make you think you're getting some kind of high-quality thread count sheet. Great idea by the way! These sheets are thin and probably will not last for a long time. However, if you need something quickly (like we did) they got the job done... and for the price... great price. Just don't buy these thinking you're getting some kind of discounted high-quality sheet set... you're getting a $25 sheet set.
customer_reviews.author: Eric K. Holmes

customer_reviews.title: They have straps!
customer_reviews.text: My biggest pet peeve with sheets is how the bottom sheet doesn't stay tucked in and comes loose. I have straps for all of mine, and forgot to order a set when I got these sheets. My *excitement when I pulled them out and it had elastic straps on all the corners already! Seriously, this is incredibly simple and no one does it? The sheets are true to color, and **feel nice. I'm off to purchase another set. *My life is boring, I get excited over sheets. ** No, they do not feel like 1200 tc cotton. Only high thread count cotton feels like high thread count cotton. Those run 100-150 easily. These are inexpensive and nice.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Awful smell!
customer_reviews.text: These sheets had the most awful small EVER! I washed them as soon as I took them out of the package as I would any new linen. Noticed as soon as I unpackaged them that they smelled horrible. I figured after a good wash that it would help. Even went out and bought some smelling good fabric softener hoping that would solve the problem. NOPE! I washed them 4 times and they still smelled like vomit. There is no way these were new sheets. So disappointed. I ended up just throwing them away.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: Update
customer_reviews.text: I previously left these sheets a good review, be cause out of the bag they seem to be great sheets. However, I must update, because now after washing they have became extremely scratchy and rough against the skin, to the point I can no longer sleep on them and have been putting a blanket on top until im able to purchase new sheets. Id strongly recommend a different fabric blend as they are crap if you ever wash them.
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: Love these sheets
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these sheets. With some bad reviews I was skeptical but decided to try them anyways. I loved them much more than my $90 sheets from target. These stay on the bed. They have deep pockets which is good cause my mattress is really deep. They’re comfortable. I now have two sets of these and likely to order a third. For how cheep they are I’m surprised but I truly love them! (I did order two darker colors. No they’re not see through)
customer_reviews.author: shoebox

customer_reviews.title: These are 100% POLYESTER
customer_reviews.text: Don't be fooled by the "1500" in the name.. they aren't 1500-count sheets & they are 100% polyester (picture of tag included). They have more of a slip than cotton sheets - it's a completely different kind of softness. I'm surprised the rating is so high because to me, they're just ok which is why I rated them 3-stars (but my last set was $150 from BB&B). If you're used to luxurious sheets, I don't recommend. But for the price they're ok. I don't regret buying. Also, they DO wrinkle. After sleeping in them for a few days, I just checked & where I lay is all wrinkled.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Sheets
customer_reviews.text: My favorite sheets for fabric quality, durability, softness and comfort,, laundering ease (come out of dryer wrinkle-free), fabric weight (light, not bulky), and appearance. Over time I've purchased multiple sets of the gray chevron design (a perfect gray color and look) and use year-round (Pacific Northwest). After two years, no fabric pilling or problems. The sheets look like new. These are now the only sheets I'll buy.
customer_reviews.author: jremma

customer_reviews.title: Don't let the low price fool you
customer_reviews.text: These are quality sheets. They are very well made, soft, comfortable and fit well. I always wash new sheets before putting them on the bed and I noticed there was NO chemical smell when I received them and they went through the washer and dryer with no signs of wear, shrinking, discoloring or anything else. I like them so much, and they are such a good value that I plan on ordering another set or two.
customer_reviews.author: Salty Dog

customer_reviews.title: So Far, A Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Full size review. I've been hooked on microfiber sheets now for a few years. Many are the softest sheets I've ever slept on. This set is a little cheaper than some, and that's reflected in the softness of the material. The fit is better than I expected. The fitted sheet is plenty big and should fit the thicker mattresses. The flat sheet is adequate, as are the 2 pillow cases. Their level of softness is acceptable. Too soon to tell on longevity. My only concern after two nights is that these sheets tend to make me sweat a little more than some. Because of that, I'm undecided about recommending them and if I would by them again.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Good sheet IF it fits
customer_reviews.text: Gave 3 stars because it doesn't fit right. I ordered this set because it says in the description that the 14" depth can fit up to 16". My pillow top mattress is just under 15" and it barely reaches. Thought the elastic bands on the corners would help but they're pointless since they're short and sewn way too close to the corners, so the sheet still pops off regardless :( Besides that it looks and feels good, but I can't really enjoy it because the sheet won't stay in place. Note: I've noticed that in many of these sheet set searches, the headings say 16" depth but in the description it says 14" depth. Take note of what you're buying!
customer_reviews.author: Denielle 🌺

customer_reviews.title: STAYS IN PLACE! BUY THESE!
customer_reviews.text: DEFINITELY BUY THESE SHEETS!! I am picky with my sheets, and these passed ALL my TESTS! SOFTEST, BEST SHEET SET EVER! STAYS IN PLACE even WITH MY 8 YEAR OLD DAUGHTER JUMPING ALL OVER OUR BED! Very inexpensive, but feels LUXURIOUS TO SLEEP ON! Extra elastic on corners of fitted sheet ACTUALLY KEEP SHEET FROM SLIDING OFF OUR DEEP POCKET PILLOW TOP KING SIZE BED! NO MORE STRUGGLING WITH CORNER SHEET CLIPS! THESE ARE BUILT INTO THE SHEETS! VERY BRIGHT, VIVID PINK COLOR IS BEAUTIFUL! I even ordered my Mom a set for her bed for Mother's Day. GREAT GIFT FOR ANY OCCASION!! HIGHLY RECOMMENDED BY PICKY SHEET LADY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Serenity's Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Are super soft ... worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for our guest bedroom twin bed. The silver color is exactly like the photo. The sheets are very soft. I LOVE the sewed in elastic corner straps, I wish all sheets came like this. No more clipping on the "suspender clips" for sheets. The elastic goes all the way around the sheet. Deep pockets fit great. There was no pilling or scratchy feeling after 1 washing. They are light weight perhaps making a good summertime sheet. The polyester fabric does not feel heavy like other expensive quality cotton sheets but for the price, I don't care. I would recommend them and I will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn H.

customer_reviews.title: Better than $120 sheets
customer_reviews.text: I see reviews complaining about these, but they totally exceeded my expectation. Perhaps it is the pattern or dye that differentiates the sheets. I got the grey paisley as a spare set because I have expensive sheets. I totally prefer the paisley ones and will buy another set. They ARE deep. Almost enough to cover the mattress and box. They are SOFT. Almost feel like flannel, yet have the lightness of microfiber. I LOVE these sheets! Complaints must be about different patterns. I suppose the dyes and weaves could affect this. The grey paisley ones rock!
customer_reviews.author: D. Adams

customer_reviews.title: They fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable sheets, but the best thing about them is the way they fit. Not only do they have the fitted corners, but they have an additional elastic strap on each corner to guarantee they won't pull up. The top sheet is the perfect size. I had a set from another company that was so wide the top sheet hung well below the comforter. This top sheet hangs just above the comforter on both sides. It's a small issue but important enough that I would definitely buy these sheets over the other brand any day of the week. I'm very satisfied with my purchase and would recommend these sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Willie

customer_reviews.title: Strange.
customer_reviews.text: Strange. Maybe great, maybe not. So far I washed them just to get the "new fabric" smell out, and they're impossible to fold. Maybe because I'm a guy, but they're so "fluffy" when you fold them, they just flop around until they're in a wad. Okay, chalk that to me. What genius thought it was a good idea to sew the tag on the top? I mean under your chin top. The fitted sheet has a white elastic strap in the corners. The picture shows an elastic cord in the sheet AND an elastic strap, so maybe it's like a 'sheet keeper'. They're for the RV so I haven't put them on yet, so I'll update this when I do.
customer_reviews.author: Allen S

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Dreams 😴
customer_reviews.text: Love these SUPER SOFT, Nice deep pockets. I now have bought 3 sets. If I could change anything, I really wish they would have 4 pillow cases instead of two.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle Lau

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit a 14" mattress perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Although it says this set has deep pockets, it is not deep enough for my 14" mattress. The sides are barely covered by the fitted sheet. And the sheet is kinda moves and wrinkles underneath you. The flat sheet is huge and hangs to the floor. The pillowcases are huge too. They have embroidery that is totally pointless as it gets folded in. The fabric is soft and pleasant to the touch. I bought a gray set (silver) and was a bit disappointed because the color is gray with a lilac undertone. The bottom line, they are not too bad to return them but I wouldn't buy this set again.
customer_reviews.author: Evo

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, colourful sheet set!
customer_reviews.text: I love these sheets. Someone gifted me the pink and I was so impressed I ordered the lavender, and the others day the pale yellow as the Twin size finally came back in stock haha. I haven’t noticed any particularly special “stain-resistance” or “wrinkle-free” qualities, but that wasn’t why I chose them. They’re very soft, and surprisingly good quality for the price. I haven’t had any problems with rips or tears and I’ve been using them for about 4 months. The colours are true to the stock photos too. I am very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: kei

customer_reviews.title: Super Soft Basic Budget Sheets
customer_reviews.text: The cost of these and the available colors made these a very attractive choice. They came through the laundry just fine, very easy to take out of the dryer and shake wrinkle-free, almost like permanent-press, and were every bit as soft as before they were washed. They fit a full size bed and pillows perfectly. They aren't thick but aren't like the paper-thin plain cotton ones sold at the big discount stores either. Very soft and comfortable and they don't stick to you, but not slippery like satin sheets. Great color assortment. Great sheets for the money. Going to buy some more for sure.
customer_reviews.author: CoolBoomer

customer_reviews.title: Quality excellent; Fit, not so good
customer_reviews.text: Size in question. Package and label shown as Queen. But the fitted sheet was much too large, leaving excess fabric on top of the bed. I wonder if it could be the factory applied the Queen label to a King size. If others share they fit well, this is the case of the set I received. My mattress is relatively thick/plush, so I expected the fitted sheet would be tight, but this wasn't the case. Sheets washed well and were pretty much wrinkle free out of the laundry. Pics attached.
customer_reviews.author: RAB

customer_reviews.title: I waited over a year to write this review.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait to write my review to see how these sheets hold up over time. Yes, they're super silky and comfy. They are lightweight and perfect for summer. My only pet peeve is that they pill. They didn't at first, but about a year in of weekly washings the little annoying pills showed up. They're cheap enough to replace but I had hoped they would last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Very soft sheets.
customer_reviews.text: Theses sheets are extremely soft. They are microfiber which is supposed to be more hypoallergenic which is a plus for me. They are thin but microfiber is normally on the thinner side. The seams are well stitched. They have deep pockets & have an elastic band stitched across each corner. I ordered them primarily for summer usage as I live in south Georgia but will probably end up using them year round. For the price, I do not think you could go wrong with these sheets. They were an excellent bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Dog LadyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I took a chance on these! I was so skeptical about the quality of the product due to the low price, but I was so wrong. These sheets are incredibly soft and have kept their color after multiple washes. I bought the grey sheets and will definitely buy again once they need replacing! Product arrived in good condition, true to color, no fading, no snags, no weird packaging smells. I highly recommend! The only thing that isn't necessarily a downside for me is that I wouldn't say they are wrinkly free, they do get some lines here and there but nothing that's a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Lorie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t match picture
customer_reviews.text: This is the third set of sheets I’ve bought from this brand. The first two (pink and dark gray)were great. I love them. They’re soft and stay on my bed fantastically. The white ones I ordered are a completely different story. They feel coarser and the design is totally different. They don’t have the little line of satin looking detailing on the flat sheet or the pillow cases. Also, the fitted sheet doesn’t stay on the mattress as it’s a completely different design. Disappointed by the white sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Riopel

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected...
customer_reviews.text: These are very thin, almost transparent...although they are soft and cool at least. Pattern is only on one side which I was disappointed about. It is a slippery fabric so the fitted sheet doesn't stay on the bed well. Also the seams were coming apart after just one gentle wash cycle. I bought two sets so it was unfortunate that they were not at all what I was hoping for
customer_reviews.author: JestersCap1313

customer_reviews.title: They are cheap sheets, but they are fantastic for the price and they do their job.
customer_reviews.text: First of all, these are NOT 90000 thread Egyptian spun cotton Japanese silk premium sheets made for a Dubai prince/princess, which works out great because that's not what you are! :) These fit my King sized bed perfectly, and they are comfortable. I had no issues out of the packaging, no loose threads, nothing broken, just a set of black sheets/pillowcases that look great on my bed, feel nice to sleep on, and they were so cheap that even if they only last 2 years I still got a great deal. Buy them. If you don't like them, send them back but these are a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan P.

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty color but ripped pillow case
customer_reviews.text: The sheets were a lovely color. The pockets fit nicely around the mattress. However, the pillowcase arrive with a very large and frayed rip down the seam. I had guest arriving at my home and needed the sheets. So, I did not return them but used other pillowcases. I have washed the sheets a few times and there have been no further problems. The ripped pillowcase accounts for the low review.
customer_reviews.author: Darthmomma

customer_reviews.title: There was a large dead beetle in my sheets
customer_reviews.text: I never thought it would happen to me. I’ve read some crazy reviews even 1 about a bug in someone’s sheet upon opening it and I thought that sounded crazy and must’ve been a fluke, well lightning strikes 2x. As I took the sheets out of the plastic wrap a giant dead beetle came flying out! It even has the fabric of the sheets stuck to it, so who knows how long it’s been in there, probably the last pair of sheets I buy online. Yuck.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Lamont

customer_reviews.title: Thin, green, but good in quality
customer_reviews.text: The sheets are great. Although the I was expecting them to be a little thicker (read: not able to see through them when held to light). Also, they are a bit green in color and not necessarily what I would call grey.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: Looks Nice and very soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these sheets because we were trying out a king size bed. I bought them mostly because of the price. the color is very nice (light plum). The sheets are incredibly soft. they are pretty thin, and may not last as many years as I want, but for the money, I am very happy. One nice touch is the elastic sewn into the corners that help hold down the corners. The sheets have really deep pockets. At first I thought the fitted sheet was too large for the mattress, then I wanted to purchase a mattress pad and realized that there was plenty of room for this pad. very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: clariseb

customer_reviews.title: Marble king sheets
customer_reviews.text: These are perfectly good sheets for the $25 price. Contrary to other reviews there were no ashes, fowl odors or stains! They were soft and seemed of good quality. I always wash before use anyway. There was a loose string after the Washing but otherwise were perfectly fine. And Amazon is not contracting or awarding me in any way for this review! I just hate when people leave bogus reviews for the heck of it. Not only does it harm the seller, but it confuses the buyer!
customer_reviews.author: Darrit

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THE ELASTIC ON THE CORNERS!
customer_reviews.text: We bought a Twin XL set to go on our son's new college dorm bed. With the mattress the school provides being so cheap/stiff, we also purchased a 2-inch memory foam pad, along with a mattress pad protector - all of which created a much thicker bed when done. That's where the elastic on all 4 corners of this fitted sheet came in handy! Instead of having to use those complicated sheet clips (that never seem to stay on anyway) this fitted sheet stayed put (along with all the extras), due to the corner elastic holding everything in place. Plan to buy another Twin XL set for back up.....hoping our son will wash his sheets in Mom's absence - LOL!
customer_reviews.author: Kimba-CO

customer_reviews.title: A bit thin, but soft and rich in color
customer_reviews.text: First impressions were: the color is very rich and the texture is very soft. Looks of decent quality but definitely a bit on the thin side for my taste. The fitted sheet has extra elastic reinforcement on the corners but the sewn-in elastic on the rest of the perimeter is very thin. This could cause the sheet to come loose. Overall, good quality for the price. I may buy a set or two for my guest bed but I won't buy any more for my own bed. I'm skeptical and don't think they'll hold up to regular use, but time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Lara F. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Fits our thicker queen mattress!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so impressed with these sheets. They are so soft. I didn't read reviews before purchasing these. I was pleasantly surprised with the quality considering how affordable they are. I truly love how they're made with the extra elastic in the corners of the fitted sheet. Our mattress is thicker than regular queens, so we've had trouble finding sheets that fit properly and stay on. No such issues with these, though. I plan to order these each time from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thin and hot
customer_reviews.text: These sheet are extremely similar to some $15 sheets I got at Target. What I didn’t really understand when I ordered them is that I don’t like microfiber sheets. These would be fine for a kids bed. But the elastic to hold the sheet on snapped in one corner the first time I put them on, and they are incredibly thin. And like I said, I don’t like microfiber. They are warm and feel like dirty sheets as soon even when freshly washed. I prefer cotton sheets, which feel crisp and cool when they are freshly washed. Plus there no “cool side of the pillow!” Ah!
customer_reviews.author: K. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I was attracted to these sheets because I thought they were so pretty and they were COMPARED to 1500 thread count sheets. I should have know better. The sheets are very pretty when you get them on. They are a little slick and do not have a cotton feel to them at all. I know that they are microfiber but, when you compare them to a thread count, you expect that feel. They looked amazing when I first put them on. Then they GREW. Seriously, they got bigger and bigger each night. They wrinkle up and get wadded because of the extra give. Spend the extra money and get real sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Morris

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The sheets are soft, nothing like more expensive 1500 count I've had in the past but will work. They are very thin. I read other comments saying it has deep pockets which is why I purchased. We have an 8" mattress with a thin topper, the sheets do not fit properly. If I secure top and bottom of one side the other is short, they do stay on the mattress even after my husband tosses and turns all night. This is for our RV so it will do. And the price is great so nothing to fuss about.
customer_reviews.author: Hr77

customer_reviews.title: Soft beautiful sheets
customer_reviews.text: I received my sheets fast and washed them the same day. Was so surprised to have wrinkle free sheets to put on the bed. Our first nite was wonderful . Husband could not believe how soft and yet how warm they felt , we live in the Mountains of Southern California and our nites get in the low 20s so we usually use flannel sheets in winter, but I wanted to try these new sheets instead.. We are very pleased.. love the colors I bought the leave pattern in turquoise green.. love them so much i bought the Duvet and curtain panels to dress up our room the next week..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sheets for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I gotta tell you.. at first I was skeptical about the sheets, so I bought them for camping sheets. The price is great and if they fell apart, who cares. Well, I loved them. I bought more sweets of different colors. They don’t pop off the edge of the bed, especially during hanky Panky time. There is a strap that helps keep it in place. The sheets are super soft, softer than my legs after day one of shaving... even after a few washes, unlike my legs. So, all in all.. 5 stars. Softness. No beady balls after repeat washes. Stays in place, even through the good times.. I would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy T

customer_reviews.title: Updated review
customer_reviews.text: The softness is unreal. Pair it with freshly shaven legs and I imagine it’s close to what heaven feels like. I like a thick sheet however and these are thin. I knew that before buying based on other reviews. I am also a hot box and have no problem so far with sweating with these. Update to initial review: it’s been a few months now. The sheets started “shedding” shortly after. A small hole is forming. I take back the “no sweating.” The sheets are not breathable. I’m waking up hot. Will not repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: dmc0708

customer_reviews.title: Super duper soft
customer_reviews.text: Super duper soft! Deep pocket, perfect for pillow top mattresses, or thick mattresses! Do not slide off bed, however they do seem to stain easily and not come unstained. I have dogs and they sleep in the bed and I find myself contantly soaking these sheets and oxycleaning them to get little dog dirt stains out and they do not come out, or if I sleep with make up on the pillowcases that doesn't come out either. I went with the sunshine yellow color to match the comforter I have, I would buy these again, just would opt for a darker color for this reason!
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Softer than I expected
customer_reviews.text: The price is very reasonable. If you like to be cuddled by your sheets, these are it. I haven't washed them enough to see if there is any pilling, but at the price they are, even if they did a little and that bothered you, getting another pair is inexpensive. I don't understand why people pay so much for those premium brand sheets. You could get a new set of these every six months and have a better experience than getting one of those other ones.
customer_reviews.author: R Lincoln

customer_reviews.title: Buy These, They’re a Sure Bet. No Gambles Here. FABulous!
customer_reviews.text: I love these sheets and the Parkview pattern sooooo much that I now own three sets. Apparently my guests love them, too, because I always hear compliments on them and am asked often where I was able to get such good sheets that are both new AND soft. The pattern makes me happy and the sheets are soft, durable, and don’t pill at all. They look brand new even after being laundered dozens of times. I always wash them in cold water with an eco-friendly all natural detergent and a little scoop of Oxiclean for colors and dry on low heat. They are so comfortable I have been known to get eat into bed a bit early, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Laserbeam

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and luxurious
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two sets of these to replace very expensive sheets that were ruined by benzoyl peroxide. I wasn't sure what to expect from microfiber sheets or how they equate to 1500 thread count. I have only used one set so far since they arrived but they are definitely great sheets. They are soft, warm, comfortable. I haven't had to test them against the benzoyl peroxide yet, and I'm a bit scared to but I'm sure they will do as stated on Amazon. I would order these again when/if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I do like these sheets. They're soft right out of the package and have proven wrinkle free. The fitted sheet also stays nicely over the corner of my matress. What I'm not as big of a fan of, is that they get warm and stay warm. Great for winter, but not ideal for 90-100° summers. I'd probably still buy them in anothet colour unless I find a better price. But if you're menopausal and night sweats are a thing, just keep that tid bit in mind.
customer_reviews.author: MTColo

customer_reviews.title: Super soft!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these sheets for my daughter’s bed and now buying them for our bed! They came very quickly. They seem to be very good quality as well. I’ve seen some other pictures where they are super thin, but that is not the case for us. I often find her with all her sheets off at night because she gets hot. However, I haven’t seen her kick these off. I will update review when we receive ours just to verify. So far they seem great!! I’ve also washed these and there were no problems with seems coming undone or shirinking. One other thing they are not stuff like new sheets are at all! They fee very nice!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: Best Sheets for an RV "Short" Queen
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in the royal blue color. Previously using standard queen size sheets on our RV bed, but if you know how RV bed sizes work, we don't have a true queen, bur rather a RV "Short" queen. Using full size sheets make for a sloppy bess that doesn't fit and looks terrible. These sheets fit excellent, and are so soft and comfortable. My wife is planning to order the same sets in different colos (brown and tan) to match our other comforters. Price was actually cheaper than regular queen sheets as well. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sure wish they were larger!
customer_reviews.text: I just received our sheet sets and we just put the queen size on our new bed. The sheets are very soft. I am disappointed with the size. The deep pockets barely fit our Sleep Number bed. There is about 1 inch underlap. Sure hope they stay on at night! The top sheet is very lacking in width. It can't even be tucked in on the sides. I will keep them to be fair and give them a few nights before I make final decisions. I don't think I can return them after that - unfortunately. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Carothers

customer_reviews.title: Soft. Lightweight. Great Pricepoint.
customer_reviews.text: VERY VERY soft. Lightweight (not a cold weather sheet!). & comfy. This pink is extremely pretty! And the price is great! The pillow cases are a Bit small but I made them work. With the different sizes mattresses these days, maybe Manufacturers should offer King Size Pillow Cases “on the side”. (I’ve found Asian/Chinese made Bed Linens & Clothing tend to run small vs USA-made items.) While the sheets themselves were generous (prior to washing) they did shrink a bit. The Pillow Case WAS a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: KatLady

customer_reviews.title: Queen Sheet Set
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping this set was the answer to the memory foam mattress grabbing hold of the sheet, and forcing us to remake the bed every night, tucking in the edges. IF you wear night cloths, the fabric is "sticky" and clings everytime you move. The quality was good, and nicely surprised, the corners had elastic to keep tucked in. Our memory foam defeated this product, and will continue to find that perfect fitted sheet!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Four years and still comfy
customer_reviews.text: Four years.. I am just now writing this review because I just realized enough time has gone by that we have truly tested these sheets! I'm giving four stars instead of five only because they are starting to pill and they are not super breathable. However, we have used these as our main sheets (nightly) for four years and they are so soft, so comfy, and cool to the touch. Great value for the money!!! Will buy again for sure..
customer_reviews.author: A. Williams

customer_reviews.title: HAVE TO BUY
customer_reviews.text: I love these sheets!!! I have had them for almost a year now and they have not let me down. No color fading, stain resistant, wrinkle free and they are so soft. I'm purchasing another set of this brand because they are so good. I purchased the teal color.
customer_reviews.author: Lynnea

customer_reviews.title: Gray is not Gray
customer_reviews.text: Sheets themselves are ok. However, I ordered gray ones to go with the rest of my bedroom decor. However, they are not Gray! They are a very deep army green. So if you're looking for a deep army green color, these are the sheets for you. If you are looking for gray sheets, do not purchase these! I would send them back but I opened them and washed them in the hopes that they would fade a little and/or they would "match" what I already have in my bedroom. No such luck! Pretty disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Best Sheets Ever!
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are so soft and durable this is my second set! I can not stress enough how well made and comfortable the sheet set is. I have a king size bed w/ a mattress cover, and tend to have issues with sheets coming loose from the corner. Not with these! There is a elastic band on the fitted sheet to help hold them in place. I could not begin to brag on these sheets enough! A must have! I will be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: JMurrell

customer_reviews.title: Soft & Satisfied...BUT
customer_reviews.text: Edit: Before use, I washed the sheets (if you didn't..that is yo business). I followed directions, but ended up getting shedding of the sheets (see pic). I will wash again. Hopefully it will go away. Other than that they are still soft as they can be. Soft and comfortable. Cool to the body. Beautiful color!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Bentley

customer_reviews.title: Great Sheets
customer_reviews.text: OK Maybe I am not a purchaser of fancy pants sheets like other negative reviewers. But neither were you! I purchased these sheets because they were affordable and reviews said they were soft. So far they have held up well and are very soft. They are not 12 million thread sheets nor are they made only with the fibers of virgin tiger moths who only reproduce around the Nile. If you are a normal person you will be quite happy with them. If you are one who gets angry enough to leave bad reviews about bed sheets.......don't worry. You never encounter the wet spot so you won't have to worry about it staining them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You Get What You Pay For
customer_reviews.text: Basically they're nice sheets.They're soft, and "sorta" wrinkle free. However the pictures of the "Luxury Bed Sheets" show some very nice embroidery.That was a selling point to me. The embroidery is one ONE SIDE of the pillow cases only.There is nothing on the top sheet.(very deceiving) Where the hen is tucked in on the pillow cases,the bottom side hem is not even sewn in,and it doesn't stay. I'm totally disappointed and would not recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Best Sheets! Super soft, durable, and great price
customer_reviews.text: We love these sheets. We received some blue ones for our wedding, and 4 years later we decided to get some new ones! Our other ones were not really worn out, but we wanted a new color and were looking for something new. We ended up getting the exact same sheets in a different color because we loved them so much. We love the thread count, but don't feel like we are sliding all over at night. The sheets keep us cool, and are really easy to wash and make the bed! WE love the deep pockets so that the sheets don't come undone in the middle of the night. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Cody and Josee

customer_reviews.title: So soft! Fits well
customer_reviews.text: These are super super soft! I bought two sets. An extra to have while I was washing sheets. Makes it more convenient and worth it. Especially if you have little ones that need a new set in the middle of the night(pee, throw up) you can just throw the extra set on the bed and deal with cleaning them in the morning. The fitted sheet also fits very well on the mattress. Please let me know if you found this review helpful
customer_reviews.author: Megan S.

customer_reviews.title: Color beautiful not so happy with the fabric
customer_reviews.text: First of all the color is beautiful I absolutely love it but the fabric is very soft and very very thin and I don't feel that that it will last a long time if it's washed a lot of times it's in the guest bedroom so that won't be a problem I don't think it was just kind of unhappy that when I did wash them before I put them on the bed they came out really wrinkled so I'm not as happy as I was when I first song because the color just lit up the room
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Sheds profusely
customer_reviews.text: The sheets are really soft and comfortable they’re pretty however they just shed I put them on one night the next morning I see the Lots of balls of the sheet color on the sheets around the area and so far it’s still shedding also the color on it will stain your clothes so I guess you need to wash them before you put them on not really what I was looking for as to the sheet I guess you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Heaven Sent22

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t fit, disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered California King size. The fitted sheet will DEFINITELY not fit a California king. I have a queen mattress, quite possibly will fit, maybe, the queen. The material definitely do not think the material matches the description. See below: Sweet Home Collection 4.4 out of 5 stars 32,329 Reviews 1500 Supreme Collection Extra Soft California King Sheets Set, Teal - Luxury Bed Sheets Set With Deep Pocket Wrinkle Free Hypoallergenic Bedding, Over 40 Colors, California King Size, Teal Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Deffinitly worth it, will purchase again!
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous at first to purchase these bc there are a few mixed reviews. Some reviews had said the sheets were thin and easily stained so this did sway me to purchase the black set. I do think the sheets are thin but super soft and breathable. The elastic corners are also a huge plus and hug the mattress very nicely. I also did wash the sheets and they held up very well. I will defiantly be purchasing again I have a California king and I find it very difficult to find sheets especially for this price deffinitly worth it!
customer_reviews.author: T.K.R

customer_reviews.title: They’re sheets. You use them when you’re unconscious mostly.
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are pretty decent for the price. You may find some small runs and stitching defects but nothing that affects their use. The fitted sheet doesn’t seem to pop off the mattress corners despite heavy activity (giggity) so bonus points for that. You’ll be unconscious when you are using them most of the time. You can use the sheet to wrap someone up like a burrito, pretty nice functional diversity. Unlike many other bedsheet packaging, this one does not have an overly generic picture of an unrealistically clean bedroom, so you will feel no guilt about the tidiness of yours. Phew, disaster averted.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I don't like microfiber sheets...They are too thin and they feel 'wrong'! I needed mint green sheets and couldn't find any cotton ones, at least that I could afford, so after reading the reviews I ordered these. When they arrived i decided I needed to try them before I put them on guest bed. Much to my surprise I like them very much! They didn't have that 'thin' feel, and they felt good to the rest of me (I am picky about sheets!)...I like them so much I ordered another set... haven't received yet, let's hope they are consistent with the first set! Oh, color was beautiful, too!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sheets for the money!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: OK so I’m super picky about my sheets. Like I like super high thread count all cotton sheets for the most part. I was in a pinch and needed sheets but I didn’t necessarily want to pay a fortune for them. I will say I absolutely love the sheets. They don’t make me too hot they are very very soft and they stay on my bed they actually have a little red elastic on each corner to make sure it doesn’t slip off and they’re super soft these are great sheets for the money
customer_reviews.author: Mary O

customer_reviews.title: Great Sheets - Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: This set is a great buy for the price. They’re soft, comfy, definitely do not feel cheap, & are actually accurately described & sized! Again, great sheets for the price - they are of equal quality to sheets I have purchased for around $75. They’ve held up well to 2 dogs jumping on them regularly (no snags) and couple of washes. The material hasn’t deteriorated in any way or shrunk from the dryer. Will purchase more for the entire family & I highly recommend to others as well!
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen P.

customer_reviews.title: They don't breathe and either have oil stains or will develop them
customer_reviews.text: I guess for the cheap price these are okay, but you're better off buying something a little bit nicer that will actually last. They seem to either trap oil or have some oil in them from the manufacturing process, and when you try to wash them (have tried several times with different detergents and stain removers on hot and cold) the oil will not come out. I think because they are made of some synthetic material they trap oil in them and they do not breathe well either. I would steer clear of these and get something made with natural fibers, you get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: Jonny Utah

customer_reviews.title: Not like they used to be
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these two years ago and fell in love! After two years they started to become worn and would have little nubs of fabric by my feet (or head depending on how you put on the sheet). With this new set the amount of nubs and fabric coming off the sheets it crazy! The loose fabric has weaves it’s way into my pajamas and anything else that has come in contact with them. It’s like a sweater that sheds everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: J. McCabe

customer_reviews.title: These were not soft and were stained upon arrival.
customer_reviews.text: These felt like cheap, plastic feeling sheets out of the package. What's worse, is they came with a red stain on them. The only reason I gave them a 2 star was because they came with anchor straps on them to help keep the sheets from slipping, which I really liked and wish all sheets came with that. There is absolutely no way these were 1500 thread count sheets. I've had dollar store sheets softer than these things.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Super cheap, flimsy, yellow color is gaudy
customer_reviews.text: Well, I guess you get what you pay for. These are the cheapest, flimsiest, looking and feeling sheets I've ever touched, looked at or bought. Seriously, there is no quality of any kind in these sheets. I suppose they might be OK for camping or something. I don't know. I have been using Target sheet sets, which cost more but are definitely worth the extra cost. Am returning these to Amazon; and driving to the closest Target tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Clutter Hater

customer_reviews.title: Love These Sheets
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set of these sheets. I have washed them many times and I am extremely pleased. I'm not sure if they would bleed as I always wash them with very dark colors, but they come out of the dryer just like new. I haven't experienced any piling, but I will say that they are a bit slippery on the bed. It's not bad enough to complain, just know that they may move a bit, however they stay on the mattress very well. These feel very high end as though the thread count were very high.
customer_reviews.author: TampaBay

customer_reviews.title: Soft, but a bit "heavy"
customer_reviews.text: So we got these to try them in lieu of our beloved bamboo sheets. Yes, they are very soft, but they also feel a bit heavy, and they do not breathe as much as our bamboo. The price difference, however, is worth the further experimentation. (Our bamboo sheets run over $100 per set for 100% bamboo) At night, I will wake up needing to toss these off me due to the fact they feel a bit heavy, in that, they don't seem to breathe, causing a heat build-up. Other than that, they seem to be ok, and additional testing will be needed to see how they hold up to repeated washing, maintaining softness, (or getting softer like the bamboo.)
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Soft sheets, good value
customer_reviews.text: These are not stain resistant, I put them on my washer which I didn't realize, had something on it and it left a small stain on my new sheets🤦🏽‍♀️that's my fault though. The sheets are thin. However, they are soft but I'm not sure they will last long. I wash my bedding often so I will update after sometime. Definitely better than anything you'd get at Walmart for the same price!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought a Second Set!
customer_reviews.text: I’m pretty fussy about my bedding and these sheets ranked high enough on my list that I had to buy a second set! I thought I was purchasing the Light Blue for he second set because the Misty Blue was out of stock. As it turns out, I actually received the Misty Blue color. Everything worked out despite my confusion. These are a wonderful sheets. I have to use a laundromat and by the time I get my things back home, they tend to be wrinkled - except for these sheets. And they are so soft! The only negative thing I can say is that they make it difficult to get out of bed in the morning : )
customer_reviews.author: DDC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome beautiful sheets!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Purple 1st gen mattress, and these sheets fit perfectly. I really only use the pillowcases and fitted sheet, but it's all I need. The fitted sheet has built in sheet stays, and I've never had a corner slip off. I was worried these sheets wouldn't feel great, but they're very soft! The colors are vibrant and a couple people have asked where I got them! Would buy these again no problem!
customer_reviews.author: Elise S

customer_reviews.title: 1500 Supreme Collection Extra Soft Twin XL Sheets Set
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought these sheets for our new bed. It's one of those that have 2 twin mattresses so you can raise the head/foot areas independently. I was holding my breath because I love my husband and he's smart but wasn't sure how much he knew about ordering sheets online. I like a certain Count and I like them to be soft or sateen but when they arrived, I was happy with them.... they are very soft and comfortable to sleep on. They wash up nicely as well. I liked them so much that I ordered a set for our king size bed in the guest room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft and lovely sheet set
customer_reviews.text: I love this new sheet sets. It's very soft and comfortable I got mine in the light pink pink it also comes with elastic band to keep the corner pocket from popping off the bed that was a great idea for them to do. I will be ordering more these sheets at. They are not wrinkle free I don't know any cheap that's wrinkle free. Stain resistant I have no idea I just gave it three stars but what doesn't get stained LOL.
customer_reviews.author: True Facts

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews for some of the various inexpensive microfiber sheet sets you see come up as Amazon deals frequently. Many complain about thinness, pilling and color inconsistency. That's not the case with this set for me. They were color accurate and a very good thickness while being very soft and comfortable. They for the bed as queen sheets should. They went through the initial wash with no problems at all. Being microfiber, the 's for sticks to them a lot, but that's the price you pay for inexpensive microfiber sheets. Overall, I can't complain and wouldn't hesitate to buy another set.
customer_reviews.author: J. Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are so soft out of the box. I waited to right my review until after I washed them. I love the “lip” on the pillowcase that keeps the pillow in. I didn’t realize they also had the fitting sheet band on them to keep them on the mattress. My boyfriend is a tornado in his sleep and usually pulls the sheets up but these stayed in place. My only complaint is that they collect hair and lint (we have dogs and it’s hard to clean it off).
customer_reviews.author: ToriiBrooke33

customer_reviews.title: Great sheets, soft, won't shrink, fit deep mattress well
customer_reviews.text: Great, durable set of microfiber sheets. These are a super high thread count microfiber, not the "suede" like microfiber. They feel like really high thread-count cotton sheets but are actually synthetic. The fitted sheet is perfect (fit my deep pocket memory foam mattress perfectly), also they don't shrink since they are synthetic. THe only complaint I really have that knocked them down a star was that they aren't sewn that well in the sense that there are a lot of "loose threads" at the seams. Doesn't show under a comforter and they are easily removed so otherwise a great buy at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: MarcKatyTexas

customer_reviews.title: Best sheets ever !!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these sheets. Bought 3 sets a teal and a yellow and the mocha. First I tried the teal one. What a beautiful color. And so soft. Next the yellow one. So sunny and cheerful. Then the mocha. It has the most beautiful sheen to it. It literally glows. I was hesitant to buy but the question and answers helpline was what convinced me. And the company was very helpful with my question and helped me out with ordering. They are nice and thin so they are cool. Yet not too thin. Note: the yellow sheets do show the mattress design because they are a lighter color. No biggie. Get these sheets ! You won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: J S

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious bargain
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with these sheets. They are truly deep pocket and fit my pillow top perfectly. The added elastic on each corner is a nice bonus. They really stay put. They are soft and comfy. I have read negative reviews complaining about the seams being single stitched. I think some have unrealistic expectations. They are 1500 thread count and $20. You can’t get 300 count sheets at box store for $20. They are well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: King size sheets
customer_reviews.text: Everything about these sheets are great. Only thing is the king size sheets could be just a tad wider - they reach across the bed just fine, but I prefer top sheets that are draped just a little more over the sides of the bed - but this is very minor as sheets are a delight to sleep on. Very cool and soft. I would buy them again as comfortable as well as durable.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Harmon-Schifferling

customer_reviews.title: Soft Material - Fit Well
customer_reviews.text: We just received these sheets in sage and purple. They had a strong odor that went away with two washes - I used a little vinegar the second time through. They are super soft and the colors are rich. They fit the mattress in our trailer perfectly even though it's an aftermarket, super thick one. I haven't noticed any wrinkles to speak of. All in all I'm very happy with these sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn T

customer_reviews.title: Great sheets
customer_reviews.text: I really like these sheets! Oddly, I didn't think I would. I thought they would end up being too warm and I'd wake up sweating. Not the case! They are very soft like a very thin flannel feel almost and they stay cool. The fitted sheet has an extra elastic corner to keep them put, and they stay. My only issue is the huge tag on the flat sheet is at the top corner. Ive had it happen woth other sheets and i cant stand it. Definitely not a deal breaker though. Overall the sheets are great.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

product_meta.title: 1500 Supreme Collection Extra Soft Twin XL Sheets Set, White - Luxury Bed Sheets Set with Deep Pocket Wrinkle Free Hypoallergenic Bedding, Over 40 Colors, Twin XL Size, White
feature_bullets: LUXURY QUALITY 3 PIECE (TWIN XL) SHEET SET - Embroidered pillowcases, deep pocket fitted sheets, 100% double brushed bed sheets for premium comfort and heirloom-style quality. A fresh set of bed sheets is always welcomed whether it be for your own bed or as a gift. With over 40 different color sheet set options there will certainly be the perfect match for any bedroom furinture set. Whatever the occasion may be these soft and cozy bed sheets are a great choice.

HOW WE MEASURE UP: Queen: 1 Flat (92" x 102") 1 Fitted (60" x 80") and 2 Standard Pillowcases (20" x 30"). King: 1 Flat (102"x105") 1 Fitted (78"x80") and 2 King Pillowcases (20"x40"). Cal King: 1 Flat (108"x102") 1 Fitted (72"x84") and 2 King Pillowcases (20"x40"). Full: 1 Flat (81"x96") 1 Fitted (54"x75") and 2 Standard Pillowcases (20"x30"). Twin: 1 Flat (66" x 96"), 1 Fitted (39" x 75"), 1 Standard Pillowcase (20" x 30"). Twin XL: 1 Flat 66"x102", 1 Fitted 39"x80", 1 Pillowcase 20"x30".

DEEP POCKETS: Fits mattresses up to 16" deep with elastic all around the fitted sheet HIGHEST QUALITY BRUSHED MICROFIBER -Made of the highest quality microfiber with the largest selection of rich vibrant colors that will certainly add to your bedroom decor. These bed sheet sets are also wrinkle and fade resistant to give your bed that fresh new ironed look every single time!
WASH INSTRUCTIONS: Machine wash in cold water with similar colors. Tumble dry low. Do not bleach. Equivalent to 1500 Thread Count Sheet Sets. Brand New and Factory Sealed No Ironing Necessary.
Lay flat for 10-15 minutes and watch the wrinkles completely disappear!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars61,100 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
